experience_assessment: I do not know much about this area.
review_assessment:_checking_correctness_: I did not assess the derivations or theory.
I did not assess the experiments.
title: Official Blind Review #4
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I made a quick assessment of this paper.
review:
This seems to be an ambitious paper that claims to replicate the phenomenon of “spontaneous” learning of compositional language (as in Choi 2018) under relaxed constraints.  It extends the two-agent description game, which agents swap between Teacher and Student roles (“obverter technique”) into a multi-agent game in which messages can be rejected.

There are problems with clarity, particularly after page 4 (Sections 3.2 and 3.3), starting with the paragraph about how their architecture differs from the preexisting architectures. The lack of line numbers in the submission makes it impractical to give detailed feedback.

Overall I have had a lot of difficulty understanding the proposed method, and would have needed more time (or more background knowledge) in order to properly evaluate this paper.
